verses.name: Proverbs 22:6
verses.text: Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:7
verses.text: The rich ruleth over the poor, and the borrower is servant to the lender.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:8
verses.text: He that soweth iniquity shall reap vanity: and the rod of his anger shall fail.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:9
verses.text: He that hath a bountiful eye shall be blessed; for he giveth of his bread to the poor.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:10
verses.text: Cast out the scorner, and contention shall go out; yea, strife and reproach shall cease.
